item.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO rated for Switch 2 in Saudi Arabia
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/dragon-ball-sparking-zero-rated-for-switch-2-in-saudi-arabia

  • Switch 2

Port announcement seemingly leaked.

The General Authority of Media Regulation of Saudi Arabia has rated an unannounced Switch 2 version of fighting game Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO.

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on October 11, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques.

Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in Dragon Ball!

Key Features

  • Breathtaking 3D Fights – Engage in heart-pounding, high-speed 3D battles that stay true to the anime and video game series, with breathtaking visuals and authentic combat moves like beam clashes, rush attacks, movements too quick for the eyes to see, and planet-razing ultimate attacks.
  • Rivals Make You Stronger – Challenge other players online to test your skills, or sit down with friends offline to hone your skills exclusively in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber! Fight your way to become a champion across various tournament modes and victory conditions.
  • Blaze a New Path – Conquer the action-packed battles from the beloved original story, or discover and unlock new encounters for your favorite Z-Fighters and more. Relive your favorite moments from the series through cutscenes you can experience from the perspectives of eight characters!
  • Create, Play, and Share – Recreate your favorite battles from throughout the Dragon Ball story, or set up your dream story battle with your favorite characters! Share your creations with other fans and experience the battles brought to life by imaginations around the world.
